sentence: The spot, by Alex Lasry, a Milwaukee Bucks executive, doesn't shy away from the economic problems pulling down Biden's poll numbers: supply-chain shortages and surging inflation.
title: What Mattered This Week

sentence: However, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry trails just behind him at 16 percent, a difference that falls within the poll's margin of error.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Democratic Senate primary tightening in Wisconsin: poll
